module.name: Asterisk SIP Settings
module.description: Use to configure Various Asterisk SIP and PJSIP Settings
module.changelog: *15.0.6.14* FREEI-733: Change allow_reload for pjsip to be No by default. *15.0.6.13* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.6.12* Fixing FREEPBX-20469 *15.0.6.11* FREEPBX-20354 sipsettings setconfig json-arr error correction *15.0.6.10* FREEPBX-19942 Changing driver from chan_sip to both rewrites chan_sip ports *15.0.6.9* FREEI-513 Can't Change The Default TLS Port Assignment to PJSIP *15.0.6.8* FREEPBX-19525 Remove deprecated usage of bindaddr and bindport and replace with udpbindaddr *15.0.6.7* Fixing FREEPBX-19484 Reload issue *15.0.6.6* FREEPBX-17803 Allow changing of Endpoint identification matching priority in PJSIP *15.0.6.5* fixing legacy restore *15.0.6.4* Revert setting RTP defaults *15.0.6.3* Set RTP Defaults *15.0.6.2* FREEPBX-19505 *15.0.6.1* Backup *15.0.6* FREEPBX-18811 *15.0.5* FREEPBX-18597 SSL Method includes TLSV1.1 and 1.2 *15.0.4* FREEPBX-17871 Allow setting keep_alive_interval in PJSIP global section *15.0.3* FREEPBX-18165 pjsip allow reload should be defaulted to yes *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Backup 15
